title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.162 - Health-related beds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.162 - Health-related beds

State Regulations

Beds in facilities providing institutional care and
services with nursing services available, but not continuous. Refer to the
definition of residential care in section
444.18
(d)(7)
of
this Article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.162

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
